alert.note: Alert for Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Rockingham and eastern Henry Counties and the City of Martinsville through 830 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Price, or near Stoneville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Martinsville... Stoneville... Axton... Ridgeway... Leatherwood... Villa Heights... and Chatmoss. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
